text.p: Headlines from major national newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
EL PAIS
- (Prime Minister) Aznar and (Socialist opposition leader) Gonzalez agree to future meeting to diminish political crisis
- Director of tax office tried to take tax files
- Earthquake sees hours of panic in Galicia
EL MUNDO
- Aznar and Gonzalez agree on convenience of diminishing political crisis
- (Socialist spokesman) Almunia accuses (Socialist left-winger) Guerra of threatening most of Socialist party PSOE
ABC
- Princess Cristina presides over "Cavia" dinner at ABC
DIARIO 16
- Thanks: BBV and government-controlled banks close most viable escape route for Diario 16
CINCO DIAS
- Doctors in intensive care unit: Insurance department sacks heath insurance committee
- Real unemployment at 12 percent
- Stock market takes a breather, but continues active
- Telefonica imposes free voice mail
EXPANSION
- (Bank of Spain governor) Rojo and (German Finance Minister) Waigel reject France's request to make Maastricht more flexible
- Aznar and Gonzalez agree to open way to dialogue
- Economy Ministry intervenes in health insurance unit, in serious economic crisis
GACETA DE LOS NEGOCIOS
- Endesa cuts 4,000 jobs to save 20 billion pesetas
- Banco Bilbao Vizcaya to approve share split today
- Insurance department changes management of health insurance scheme
- New agreements break with wage moderation
